Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Isa la'i jihara bada bhale karama karega ate uha imana vala hovega tam usa de bhale kamam da udama asafala nahim hovega ate asim usa nu likha lainde ham
Ate jisa basati nu asim tahisa nahisa kara dita hove, unham la'i sabhava nahi hai uha (duni'am vala) parata a'una
Ithom taka ki jadom yajuja ate majuja khaul'ha dite janage ate uha hareka uca'i tom nikala janage
Ate saca va'ada nere a'una lagega tam unham lokam di'am akham phati'am rahi janagi'am, jinham ne inakara kita si. Ha'e! Sadi mari kisamata asim isa tom agi'ani bane rahe, sagom asim zalima si
Besaka tusim ate jisa nu tusim alaha tom binham pujade ho sare naraka da balana hana, tusim ute hi jana hai
Jekara iha asala vica pujanayoga hude â€œtam usa vica na painde. Iha sare usa vica hamesam rahinage
Usa vica unham la'i cikam hana ate uha usa vica isa tom binham kujha nahim sunanage
Besaka jinham la'i sade valom pahilam hi neki da faisala ho cuki'a hai uha usa tom dura rakhe janage
Uha usa di ahata vi nahim sunanage ate uha apani'am manapasada cizam vica hamesam rahinage
Unham nu iha vadi ghasarahata dukhi nahim karegi. Ate farisate unham da savagata karanage. Iha hai tuhade uha dina, jisa da tuhade nala va'ada kita gi'a si

Jisa dina asim asamana nu lapeta devange jisa tat'ham vahi'am de pane lapeta dite jande hana. Jisa tar'ham asim pahilam srisati da arabha kita si use tar'ham asim usa di punara sathapana karange. Iha sade jime va'ada hai asim isa nu kara ke rahange
Ate jabura vica asim upadesa tom ba'ada likha cuke ham ki dharati de varisa sade sadacari bade honage
Isa vica badagi karana vali'am la'i ika vadi khabara hai
Ate asim tuhanu tam sirafa sasara vali'am la'i rahimata bana ke bheji'a hai
Akho, ki mere kola jihari vahi a'undi hai, uha iha hai, ki tuhada pujanayoga kevala ika hai tam ki tusim agi'akari banade ho

Isa la'i jekara uha muha morana tam kahi devem ki maim tuhanu sapasata rupa vica sucita kara cuka ham. Ate maim nahim janada usa ciza sare jisa da tuhade nala va'ada kita ja riha hai ki uha nere hai jam dura
Besaka uha khul'hi'am ho'i'am galam nu vi janada hai ate unham galam nu vi jisa nu tusim luka'unde ho
Ate mainu pata nahim' sabhava hai uha tuhade la'i imatihana hove ate labha utha laina da ika mauka hove
Paigabara ne akhi'a, ki he mere palanahara! Saca'i nala faisala kara de. Ate sada raba rahimana hai, use tom asim unham galam la'i saha'ita magade ham jihari'am tusim bi'ana karade ho
